Requirements Your last action was a successful melee Strike that dealt damage against a target afflicted by a poison, and you know which poison.

Poisons attack specific parts of the bodyâ€”one venom might target the lungs, another the circulatory system, while another deteriorates the nerves. You know how to take advantage of such weaknesses. You deal @Damage[1d6[untyped]] damage of the required Strike's damage type and @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage to the target. If you're at least 18th level, you deal @Damage[2d6[untyped]] damage of each type.
